title: Activity Monitor
extract: The Activity Monitor is OS X's native GUI application for taking your computer's pulse. It shows you the processes that are running, the memory being used, who the biggest resource hogs are and allows you kill off the processes that are being too selfish with your computer's resources.Sep 18, 2012
extract_html: The Activity Monitor is OS X's native GUI application for taking your computer's pulse.
